description:
Post-build geometry measurements from actual 3D solids.

These values are measured from the built geometry after all features
(bore, keyway, DD-cut, hobbing) have been applied. They may differ
from theoretical calculations, especially for virtual-hobbed wheels.

wheel_rim_thickness_mm.description: Minimum rim thickness from wheel bore surface to tooth root (mm)
wheel_rim_thickness_mm.title: Wheel Rim Thickness Mm

wheel_measurement_point.description: Location on bore surface where minimum rim was measured

wheel_rim_warning.description: True if wheel rim thickness is below recommended minimum
wheel_rim_warning.title: Wheel Rim Warning

worm_rim_thickness_mm.description: Minimum rim thickness from worm bore surface to thread root (mm)
worm_rim_thickness_mm.title: Worm Rim Thickness Mm

worm_measurement_point.description: Location on bore surface where minimum rim was measured

worm_rim_warning.description: True if worm rim thickness is below recommended minimum
worm_rim_warning.title: Worm Rim Warning

measurement_timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when measurements were taken
measurement_timestamp.title: Measurement Timestamp

title: MeasuredGeometry
